resources.string:
"Submission Project Date: 14 December 2022"


"Group Members: "

 		"Tapasvi Patel - 991589621"
 		"Parth Contractor - 991591950"
 		"Dhruv Shukla - 991590213"


"Appointment scheduling software provides business options such as booking and canceling appointments via an Android app. The LetMeBook app allows you to view available dental clinics, and schedule appointments 24x7. The user can check their appointments on the ‘my appointments’ page. They can reschedule or cancel them. Users can log in using their credentials as well as their personal Gmail."


"Our Android Developers: "

 		"Dhruv Shukla - Worked on Login Page, Edit, Reschedule, Cancel appointment"
 		"Tapasvi Patel - Worked on Admin Console, layout UI, Specialist page"
 		"Parth Contractor - Worked Google Log in, My Appointments page, Backend"

"This is the Help page: "


"How to book a specialist?"
 "1. From the Home Page, Click on the 'Specialist' button."
 "2. You will see different Specialists card."
 "3. Click on the desired Specialist card."
 "4. You will be see the Specialist Booking Page."
 "5. Fill the Date, Time, and Reason (Mandatory)."
 "6. Click on the "Book Appointment" button. See the toast 'Your appointment is booked'."


"How to view booked appointments?"
 "1. From the Home Page, Click on the 'My Appointments' button."
 "2. You can see all your appointments with all the specialists."
 "3. You can reschedule the time of appointment."
 "4. You can also cancel the appointment."


"Admin Console Email: letmebokap@gmail.com"
 "Admin Console Password: abcd1234"
